topicTitle: Name Changer on JB, no big surprise.

posts.postText:
1) Which server: Jailbreak
2) Offender's name: I don't know what it is but here's his steamcommunity URL http://steamcommunity.com/id/I_love_you_Daegon/ 
3) Offender's SteamID: STEAM_0:1:33289438
4) Explain the situation in detail: I was begged by one of the regulars to join JB and deal with a name changer, little did I know that I had been demoted. He's still freekilling/namechanging/speedhacking ATM
5) Were any specific server rules broken: Hacking, Freekilling, Trolling
6) Any staff members on the server at the time of the offence: Depends if you consider a TTT/Puzzle a staff member on jail.
7) Proof: http://minus.com/mPNV2vbV1

I can only hope the demo captured everything :/
